items.sentence: That's an interesting remark, but it's beside the point.

When Tom is at home, he doesn't want to talk about work.
If Tom wasn't so stupid, he would've understood quicker.
I'll refer you to a cardiologist for further evaluation.
I believe Tom is mature enough to know the consequences.
Tom sounded surprised when I told him what had happened.
Having something to do makes the time pass more quickly.
The cat's sleeping on the rug in front of the fireplace.

We tried to get Tom to change his mind, but we couldn't.

Tom isn't out walking his dogs. He's upstairs, sleeping.
